name: Minimum/maximum
description:
This simple algorithm computes the minimum and maximum of two input voltages.

Note that with one input disabled, or at 0V, this effectively performs half-wave rectification.
use_cases: Extracting envelope information from audio signals
Creating dynamic sidechain effects by detecting peak levels
Generating control voltages for modular synthesizers based on input signal extremes
